name: Blocker V1
description:
Blocker is a stack based game, reverse engineered to adapt it to PC. The game is a casual, fun game.

Controls:  'A' and 'D' to move left or right (alternative keys: arrow keys).  Controls for the abilities are 'W' and 'S'

Visit the Shop to unlock abilities and combos that help you achieve a higher score.

Data is collected through game analytics to be used for the thesis project, no personal data is collected.

For more information, you can comment on this post and I will leave a reply.
